content.question: The ordinances in the passage best exemplify which of the following aspects of Calvinism?

choices.label: The rejection of Roman Catholic sacraments
The recognition of the desirability of religious toleration in mixed-faith communities
The belief that laws must be based on religious principles
The belief in the predestination of the elect to salvation

content.answer: The belief that laws must be based on religious principles
